attributes.action: make more funds available to organisations promoting religious freedom such as the Council of ex-Muslims of Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In some Islamic countries so-called "apostasy" is punishable by death.In democratic countries what is considered simply a matter of personal choice has different consequences for those Muslims who no longer wish to follow their faith.At best it is a matter of "shame";at worst it can lead to violence on the individual often organised by his/her family.I am therefore calling on this government to provide more funding to groups such as the CEMB along with other practical groups such as those providing shelter to Asian women fleeing domestic violence.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
